introduction: 3ood morning/afternoon/evening. I am of O'Brien-Sherwocd Researeh Company. We are doing a survey on smoking.

questions.question: Do you smoke cigarettes, thet is, at least a pack a week?
What is your regular brand of cigarettes, that is, the brand you smoke most often?
How many packs of cigarettes do you buy?
What new brand or brands do you remember seeing advertised?
Have you ever heard of a cigarette called Marlboro Lights?
Do you remember seeing any advertising for Marlboro Lights?
What, specifically, was said in the advertising?
What was shown in the advertising?
What ideas were they trying to get across?
